channel.title: Help Getting started on creating a server
channel.description: This is my first time wanting to create a server i need help getting started like what to download and how to place objects like alters and stuff. If u can help id also like help coding If u help me and it gets complete you can be co-owner. :D

item.title: Help Getting started on creating a server
item.dc:creator: @Dylan92 Dylan92
item.description:
@Dylan92 wrote:

Lol im really confused where would i download testscape?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 04:14:58 PM[/size][hr]Do i need winRAR?

Read full topic
item.source: Help Getting started on creating a server

item.title: Help Getting started on creating a server
item.dc:creator: @hydromcmac2 hydromcmac2
item.description:
@hydromcmac2 wrote:

  1. Start by getting a source.
  2. Learn Java.
  3. Set up the server, you need to chose either of these a no-ip account or a Hamachi Server.

Those are your choices, you said you wanted alters? o.o. Well use the search button and search for “Making Global Objects” once you have your source, and then edit the files needed there you go. That should keep you busy for a while.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Getting started on creating a server
